name: Scarlet Enchantment
description:
How to play:

  • Click White tile to invets color of 4 adjacent tiles. Clicked tile is not affected.
  • Click Red tile to clear all connected red tiles. You can do this only if amount of red tiles is equal or bigger than Border.
  • Click prepared row of tiles on top to force drop them early.
  • If there are any tiles in topmost row - you will gradually lose life, game over if life reaches 0.
  • As you clear tiles - your level increases. This leads to tiles dropping more often and border increasing, be careful!
